articles.title: Franco Salinas
articles.contents:
About me:
I am a bachelor of arts interested in Data Analysis and Business
Intelligence. I have experience conducting evidence-based research,
building dashboards, and databases, and conducting market analyses. I
have worked in corporate, non-profit, and academic settings. I am
proficient in working with time series, and longitudinal and spatial
data. I have worked with SQL, R, Python, VBA, STATA, Java, and Microsoft
Office.
Education:
I am a BA in Economics and Statistics at Macalester College. I
graduated Magna Cum Laude and Phi Beta Kappa.
Interests:
I am interested in data science, business development and
finance.
Contact Information:
Email: francosalme1998@gmail.com
Phone: +1 (612) 446-9161
